title: Successful login with valid credentials and role-based access
description: Verify that a user can log in with valid credentials and is granted access according to their assigned role (user, client, manager, admin, super_admin).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password for each role
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and the user is redirected to the appropriate dashboard or landing page
Verify role-based UI components and permissions are correctly applied

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails and appropriate error messages are shown when invalid credentials are used.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click the login button
Verify that login is unsuccessful and an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed

title: Proposal wizard mandatory field validation
description: Ensure the proposal wizard prevents advancing to the next step if mandatory fields are empty or invalid.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the new proposal wizard page
Attempt to advance wizard step without filling mandatory fields
Verify that advancing to the next step is blocked and relevant validation error messages are shown

title: Save proposal successfully after completing wizard
description: Check the proposal can be saved successfully after filling all required fields and completing the wizard.

steps.description: Login and start a new proposal using the wizard
Fill all mandatory fields with valid data through each wizard step
Save the completed proposal
Verify the proposal is saved successfully and listed in the proposals page

title: Generate PDF for proposal with correct layout
description: Validate that the generated proposal PDF matches layout requirements and contains correct proposal details.

steps.description: Create or open an existing proposal
Use the PDF generation feature to export the proposal
Verify that the generated PDF matches layout templates without errors or missing data

title: Create, edit, and link campaigns and venues successfully
description: Check that manager users can create and edit campaigns, venues, and link venues to campaigns without error.

steps.description: Login as a manager-level user and navigate to campaigns page
Create a new campaign with valid details
Verify the campaign is created and visible in the listing
Create a new venue with valid details
Verify the venue is created and listed
Link the venue to the campaign
Verify the venue is correctly linked to the campaign and visible in campaign details
Edit campaign and venue details and save changes
Verify the edited details are updated correctly

title: Inventory screen image upload enforces file type and size constraints
description: Verify that image uploads for inventory screens accept only allowed file types and respect file size limits with proper error feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory management page
Attempt to upload an image exceeding the maximum allowed file size
Verify upload is rejected with proper error message about file size limit
Attempt to upload unsupported file format (e.g. .exe, .txt)
Verify upload is rejected with proper error message about allowed file types
Upload a valid image file within size limits
Verify image upload succeeds and the image is displayed correctly

title: Interactive map loads with geospatial points and heatmap rendering
description: Ensure the interactive map loads properly with map tiles, displays points correctly, filters function as expected, and heatmap data aggregates and displays correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the interactive map page
Verify map tiles are rendered without errors
Verify geospatial points representing venues or inventory screens are displayed
Apply filters on the map data
Verify map updates to show filtered set of points
Enable heatmap layer on the map
Verify heatmap renders aggregated data correctly over map area

title: Admin user manages users with role assignment and permission control
description: Verify that admin and super_admin users can add, edit, delete users and assign roles with proper permission constraints enforced.

steps.description: Login as admin or super_admin user and navigate to user management page
Add a new user with specific role
Verify user is created with the assigned role and appears in user list
Edit an existing user's role
Verify user's role is updated and permissions reflect the change
Attempt to delete a user
Verify user is removed from the system correctly

title: Generate reports with filters and export them as PDFs
description: Check that reports are generated correctly based on selected filters and that exporting reports to PDF produces properly formatted documents.

steps.description: Navigate to the reports page
Apply various filters to generate report data
Verify report data displayed matches filter criteria
Use the PDF export function on the generated report
Verify the generated PDF matches expected layout and contains correct filtered data

title: User profile update and password change validation and persistence
description: Ensure users can update their profile information and change passwords with appropriate validation and that changes persist after submission.

steps.description: Login and navigate to user profile page
Modify profile fields (e.g. name, contact info) with valid data
Save profile updates
Verify changes are persisted and displayed correctly after reload
Initiate password change with mismatched or invalid password fields
Verify validation errors are shown and password update is blocked
Change password with valid matching new password
Verify password change is successful and persists

title: Role-based access control blocks unauthorized route access
description: Verify that users are blocked from accessing protected routes and features not allowed for their role, with appropriate feedback or redirection.

steps.description: Login with each role (user, client, manager, admin, super_admin)
Attempt to manually navigate to pages/routes restricted for the current user role
Verify access is denied with either redirection to an error or unauthorized page and no content leakage

title: System reliability under critical P0 workflows with no blocking errors
description: Validate that critical business flows (login, proposal creation, campaign management, inventory update, report generation) operate without blocking errors under normal and edge conditions.

steps.description: Execute end-to-end scenarios for all P0 workflows including login, proposal wizard, campaign and venue management, inventory image upload, map interaction, and report exports
Verify no blocking errors occur and all workflows complete successfully

title: Edge case: Proposal wizard input boundary validations
description: Verify proposal wizard handles input boundary values correctly, including very long strings, special characters, and numeric limits.

steps.description: Begin new proposal wizard and input extremely long text strings in text fields
Verify inputs do not break UI and validation correctly handles or restricts input length
Input special characters and Unicode characters
Verify these inputs are accepted or rejected based on validation rules without errors
Enter numeric boundary values (e.g., zero, max allowed)
Verify numeric fields validate boundaries properly

title: Inventory screen image upload: corrupted or partial file handling
description: Verify the system properly handles corrupted or partially uploaded image files with appropriate error messages and no crashes.

steps.description: Attempt to upload corrupted image files or simulate partial uploads
Verify the upload is rejected with an error message and system remains stable without crashes
